塌.definition: to collapse; to droop; to settle down

塌實.definition: variant of 踏實|踏实[ta1 shi5]

塌房.definition: (neologism c. 2020) (of a celebrity) to have one's reputation tank due to a scandal

塌方.definition: to cave in; to collapse; to have a landslide

塌架.definition: to collapse; to come to grief

塌棵菜.definition: Brassica narinosa (broadbeaked mustard); Chinese flat cabbage

塌陷.definition: to subside; to sink; to cave in
